prerequisites: TWO OF: Archaeology 20, Science (Biology) 20, Science (Bontany) 20, Science (Geology) 20, Science (Zoology) 20
system.description:
Your study of Palaeontology allows you to identify Pokemon Fossils using a Science (Palaeontology) Skill Check. The difficulty of this check may be modified accordingly based on the condition of the fossil.

You also gain +20 on rolls to operate Reanimation Machines (including as part of the "Revival" Downtime Action).
